div.p: No.4489, pp. 659-60, unit 71, VPRS 1187/P, outward registered correspondence, VA 475 Chief Secretary's Department, Public Record Office of Victoria.

Document is a circular (p. 660) to the heads of 15 departments (listed p. 659) within the Chief Secretary's Department, with the addressee inserted in each case as appropriate. Chief Secretary's Office

In the event of any amendments or additions being required in connection with your Estimates of Expenditure on account of the current financial year, I have the honor to request you will be good enough to forward a statement of the same as soon as possible.
Should no amendments or additions be required, I have to ask that I may be notified to that effect at your earliest convenience.
